alert.note: Alert for East Becker; East Otter Tail; Wadena; West Becker (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:19PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wadena, northeastern Otter Tail and southern Becker Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 518 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Height Of Land Lake, or 11 miles east of Detroit Lakes, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Detroit Lakes, Frazee, Menahga, Sebeka, Toad Lake, Height Of Land Lake and Wolf Lake. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; East Otter Tail; Wadena; West Becker
